entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
